articles.content: Recently, we brought you word that a streamer had successfully beaten every boss in Elden Ring without taking a single hit. It was an undeniably impressive achievement that has unfortunately been ove… [+934 chars]

articles.author: Heidi Nicholas
articles.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley devs "couldn't be happier" with Game Pass - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Disney Dreamlight Valley's lead producer Manea Castet spoke to us about the Game Pass experience, the design process for achievements, and how the game's Toy Story content update will be "considerably bigger" than Scar's update.
articles.content: Disney Dreamlight Valley became available with Early Access in Xbox Game Pass back in September and lead producer Manea Castet tells us it's been a "great success" so far.Disney Dreamlight Valley's T… [+2758 chars]
